info.name: Youtube fixed research bar
info.description:
Fucking simple, absolutely necessary. It just fixes youtube search bar on top of the page (no floating anymore).
FFS why did I waited so long to do this
info.additionalInfo: OFC it works at the time I wrote it. Since youtube likes to change its design every once in a week, it'll probably be broken in the future. I'll fix it if I judge it necessary.
